name: Astha Foods Orange Peel Powder
description:
Astha Foods Orange Peel Powder (100 gm) is a vibrant and versatile ingredient derived from dried orange peels. Rich in vitamins and antioxidants, this powder is perfect for enhancing your culinary creations, adding a citrusy flavor to dishes, or as a natural flavoring agent in beverages. Additionally, it can be used in skincare routines for it's exfoliating and brightening properties. Elevate your cooking and beauty practices with the refreshing essence of orange peel powder!

name: Meril Nail Polish Remover
description:
It is gentle on your nails & easily removes your nail polish with a nourishing formula.
It is gentle on your nails & easily removes your nail polish with a nourishing formula.

name: Pierre Cardin Studio Nails
description:
Pierre Cardin Studio Nails Nail Polish Reveals Your Nail And Hand Beauty With Its Stunning Color Options And Superior Quality. Thanks to its unique formula, Pierre Cardin Studio Nails Nail Polish provides perfect coverage and shine even in a single layer application. More Intense Colors and Long-lasting Persistence Are Obtained in 2 Layers. With Pierre Cardin Studio Nails Nail Polish Series, which has 84 Highly Pigmented Color Options, it is now very easy to reach the color and tone you are looking for. It will reveal the beauty of your hands with its shine feature and covering color options. And thanks to its soft brush technology, it covers your nail immediately and perfectly and does not leave any traces.

name: Pierre Cardin Natural Look Foundation
description:
Pierre Cardin Natural Look Foundation covers the skin imperfections and color differences and gives the skin its natural glow. It provides a luminous appearance with its unique formula. It provides a natural appearance by covering the imperfections of the skin. It is a candidate to be an indispensable part of your daily make-up with its pleasant smell and moist structure that does not leave a greasy feeling.

name: Pierre Cardin Lipliner Waterproof
description:
LONG-LASTING LIP VOLUME - With a longwear, volumizing formula that is designed to stay put from AM to PM, you'll always be looking at your best, wherever life takes you. SAFE & CRUELTY FREE - Pierre Cardin Paris gives you the chance to own make up and beauty products that are safe to use and have a conscience. This super creamy lip stick pencil is vegan, paraben free and has not been tested on animals.

name: Pierre Cardin Automatic Eyeliner Waterproof
description:
Create a hypnotic effect on your eyes with the waterproof automatic eyeliner of the Pierre Cardin Make-up cosmetic world. With the most mysterious tone of black, striking looks have never been so impressive. The fact that Pierre Cardin's automatic pen is in the form of a lift provides practicality in use. It is easily applied with its soft and creamy texture. Thanks to its highly pigmented formula, it does not flow and maintains its permanence all day long. Pierre Cardin Automatic Eyeliner is always preferred, without hesitation, thanks to its water-resistant formula. Dermatologically tested and approved.

name: Pierre Cardin Smokey Eyeliner Waterproof
description:
You will put your signature on make-up with the waterproof smokey eyeliner of Pierre Cardin Make-up cosmetic world. Apply and distribute with Pierre Cardin Smokey Eyeliner Waterproof, the favorite product of smoky eye makeup. You can apply it to the eyelid as you wish and distribute it with its special applicator. Thanks to its soft structure, it is easily applied and maintains its newly applied appearance for hours. Reflect your beauty with Pierre Cardin Makeup products. The product is dermatologically approved.

name: Cute Nail Polish Remover
description:
Cute nail polish remover protects your nails while removing the polish gently.  This mild remover with vitamin-enriched formula is friendly to your nails, protecting their enamel and shine. INGREDIENTS•          Acetone•          Isopropyl Palmitate•          Butyl Acetate•          Amyl acetate

name: Astha Foods Conch Shell (Shongkho) Powder
description:
Astha Foods Conch Shell (Shongkho) Powder (100 gm) is a traditional ingredient known for its various culinary and medicinal uses. Made from finely ground conch shells, this powder is often used in Ayurvedic practices and rituals. It is believed to enhance flavor and is sometimes used as a natural remedy for promoting health and well-being. With it's unique properties, this versatile powder can be easily incorporated into recipes or wellness routines, making it a valuable addition to your pantry.
